feed.title: PeaNUT Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v5.7.0
entry.content:
NEW

  • Users can now click the "Last Updated" date to switch between 12 and 24 hour clocks.
  • Unplugged devices now has a cleaner look.
  • InfluxDB errors are now caught to allow other data to finish being written.
  • Input fields on the settings page no longer lose focus when typing.

What's Changed

  • Package updates by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/217
  • Dates in user locale by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/219
  • Handle unplugged (or otherwise unreachable) devices more gracefully. â€¦ by @JamesGDiaz in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/221
  • Catch InfluxDB Errors by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/223
  • Packages Updates by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/224
  • Fix input fields losing focus by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/225

New Contributors

  • @JamesGDiaz made their first contribution in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/221

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v5.6.1...v5.7.0
